document.full_text: mexico's peso may dip against the dollar once the united states starts tightening monetary policy but the overall impact on mexico should be limited, finance minister ernesto cordero said on sunday.
document.title: mexico ready for tighter u.s. monetary policy -finmin
lines_and_colors: mexico's peso may dip against the dollar once the united states starts tightening monetary policy but the overall impact on mexico should be limited, finance minister ernesto cordero said on sunday.
